0126041-d-01-26-04-YVRR.Narrative: DEFECTIVE RAIL BROKE UNDER THE TRAIN WHILE IT WAS WESTBOUND.  THIS CAUSED NINE CARS TO DERAIL BEGINNING WITH THE 36TH CAR.  THERE WERE SEVEN CORN CARS, ONE WAX CAR AND ONE EMPTY CHIP CAR DERAILED.
